rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports on method and timeline factually ('will help trace the virus’s spread', 'this will take time') without high-potency framing.
Neutral language used; no moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a fact (sequencing will help) but lacks explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment states genetic sequencing will help but contains no bare negation.
States 'Genetic sequencing will help trace the virus’s spread'.
